creator: Blarma Team
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the English vocabulary learning and memorization app. With Blarma you can learn 300 words every month and improve your pronunciation. Do you want to learn British English or American English? Make your choice and learn English words with fun!

Download the English vocabulary app and try it for free.

The perfect English learning program for beginners. Improve your vocabulary by listening, writing and pronouncing. Blarma has all the necessary features.

Audio-Visual Learning:
Learn English language with pictures. Watch short videos to better understand some words. Listen to the native pronunciation of word. The information you see, hear and associate is forgotten later than the others.

Limitation of Daily Learning:
Learn 10 words every day to improve your vocabulary. It is important that you learn in a balanced way. More words learned do not mean that you can always remember them. Therefore, the number of words you can learn has a daily limit.

Question-Based Learning:
Courses are designed to learn vocabulary with fun. Start the lesson by choosing new words. Learn basic English language skills. See, listen, write and pronounce all words. Once you've learned the words, complete the lesson by answering questions.

Skill Scoring System:
At the end of each lesson, you can examine your success and mistakes in detail. By doing the activities you need, you can quickly correct your mistakes and improve your skills.

Free Activities:
- Pronunciation practice
- Writing practice
- Listening practice
- Memorization exercise

Spaced Repetition System:
As you learn new words, you begin to forget the old ones. You don't have to repeat all the words. Blarma reminds you of the words you are about to forget.

____________
We have collected the most common English words (verbs, adjectives, nouns, etc.) under 15 thematic titles according to 3 difficulty levels. All words have been translated from English to 8 languages: Spanish, French, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Turkish, Indonesian and Vietnamese.

If you have any questions about the English vocabulary app Blarma, please send an email to appblarma@gmail.com
descriptionShort: Learn English, memorize words and improve your pronunciation.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’re always making changes and improvements to Blarma. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’re always making changes and improvements to Blarma. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

title: Blarma – English Vocabulary

creator: Blarma
descriptionHtml:
Learn English vocabulary fast and easily. 10 words a day with effective pictures and native pronunciations. Enrich your vocabulary by learning English words, verbs, adjectives, nouns. Improve your pronunciation skills. Memorize the most common English words in less time.

Learn English in a fun and effective way
● Adjust learning speed: 5, 10, or 15 words per day.
● Choose the words you want to learn and start the lesson.
● Focus on pictures to learn words.
● Watch short videos to better understand some words.
● Listen to pronunciation records of words.
● Answer questions that make learning easier.
● Learn to pronounce words through feedback.
● If you want to increase your score, repeat the lesson.
● Practice as much as you want with the words you have learned.

English for beginners
If you have just started language training, consider long-term progress. Build the habit of learning at least 5 words a day. Review what you've learned with spaced repetition. The Vocabulary Builder prepares an ideal English learning program for you.


Blarma: English learning app
● Daily vocabulary lessons
● Adjustable learning speed
● English words, verbs, adjectives, nouns
● Basic, intermediate, advanced word lists
● Thematic and favorite word lists
● Pictures and translations for all words
● Pronunciation records of all words
● Vocabulary learning
● Vocabulary listening
● Word typing
● English pronunciation
● Question-based learning
● Skill-based scoring system
● Spaced repetition system

Try Blarma for free
__________________________
If you like the English learning app, you can buy a subscription. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current payment period. You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.
descriptionShort: Learn English. Enrich your vocabulary. 10 new words a day. English vocab builder

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’re always making changes and improvements to Blarma. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’re always making changes and improvements to Blarma. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.

title: Blarma - English Vocabulary

creator: Blarma Team
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the English vocabulary learning and memorization app. With Blarma you can learn 300 words every month and improve your pronunciation. Do you want to learn British English or American English? Make your choice and learn English words with fun!

Download the English vocabulary app and try it for free.

The perfect English learning program for beginners. Improve your vocabulary by listening, writing and pronouncing. Blarma has all the necessary features.

Audio-Visual Learning:
Learn English language with pictures. Watch short videos to better understand some words. Listen to the native pronunciation of word. The information you see, hear and associate is forgotten later than the others.

Limitation of Daily Learning:
Learn 10 words every day to improve your vocabulary. It is important that you learn in a balanced way. More words learned do not mean that you can always remember them. Therefore, the number of words you can learn has a daily limit.

Question-Based Learning:
Courses are designed to learn vocabulary with fun. Start the lesson by choosing new words. Learn basic English language skills. See, listen, write and pronounce all words. Once you've learned the words, complete the lesson by answering questions.

Skill Scoring System:
At the end of each lesson, you can examine your success and mistakes in detail. By doing the activities you need, you can quickly correct your mistakes and improve your skills.

Free Activities:
- Pronunciation practice
- Writing practice
- Listening practice
- Memorization exercise

Spaced Repetition System:
As you learn new words, you begin to forget the old ones. You don't have to repeat all the words. Blarma reminds you of the words you are about to forget.

____________
We have collected the most common English words (verbs, adjectives, nouns, etc.) under 15 thematic titles according to 3 difficulty levels. All words have been translated from English to 8 languages: Spanish, French, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Turkish, Indonesian and Vietnamese.

If you have any questions about the English vocabulary app Blarma, please send an email to appblarma@gmail.com.

Learn English for kids and adults. Improve your vocabulary by listening, writing, and pronouncing. Blarma has all the necessary features.

Audio-Visual Learning:

At the end of each lesson, you can examine your success and mistakes in detail. By doing the activities you need, you can quickly correct your mistakes and improve your skills.

Free Activities:
- Vocabulary quiz
- Word games
- Word typing
- Word listening
- Videos

Spaced Repetition System:
As you learn new words, you begin to forget the old ones. You don't have to repeat all the words. Blarma reminds you of the words you are about to forget.

____________
We have collected the most common English words (verbs, adjectives, nouns, etc.) under 15 thematic titles according to 3 difficulty levels. All words have been translated into 8 languages: Spanish, French, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Turkish, Indonesian, and Vietnamese.

Spaced Repetition System:
As you learn new words, you begin to forget the old ones. You don't have to repeat all the words. Blarma reminds you of the words you are about to forget.

____________
We have collected the most common English words (verbs, adjectives, nouns, etc.) under 15 thematic titles according to 3 difficulty levels. All words have been translated into 8 languages: Spanish, French, Russian, Arabic, Hindi, Turkish, Indonesian, and Vietnamese.

If you have questions about the English learning app, please email appblarma@gmail.com.
descriptionShort: Learn English Words - Vocabulary learning app. English for Beginners & Adults.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’re always making changes and improvements to Blarma. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.
